is-PoseInputHandler.description: To indicate that this describes a Pose inputhandler which reads a Pose from a topic and converts it into a frame etasl expression

topic-name.description: name of the topic to subscribe to

number_of_tries.description: the number of times unsuccesfully initialize() can be called before throwing an error

depth.description: Depth of the topic queue (i.e. buffer size storing incoming messages). Check ROS2 QoS policies for more information

feedforward_input_topic.description: (optional) If set, the inputhandler will read from the specified topic of type geometry_msgs/Twist and will be used as feedforward (i.e. time derivative of the pose)

default_pose.description: Default pose used in case that the topic defined in topic-name is not yet publishing

when_unpublished.description: Defines the behavior of the node when nothing has been published to the topic defined in topic-name during activation time of the node

oneOf.title: Use default value
oneOf.description: Uses the defined default value in the default_pose field while nothing has been published to the subscribed topic defined in topic-name. An INFO message will be logged.

oneOf.title: Throw error
oneOf.description: Throws an error if nothing has been published to the subscribed topic defined in topic-name at the time of activation of the node, preventing its activation.

varname.description: Name of the expression variable in the task specification with createInputChannelFrame. The data coming from the topic will be available in the task specification through this variable
